summary: DT: THE CONTACT STATED THERE WAS NHTSA RECALL CAMPAIGN  #05V379000 CONCERNING THE ANTI LOCK BRAKES. THIS VEHICLE HAD  THE SAME  PROBLEMS  AS INDICATED IN THE RECALL, BUT IT WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL DUE TO VIN  AND THE MODEL YEAR.  THE CONTACT REPAIRED THE VEHICLE AT HIS OWN EXPENSE.*AK
